actionCalls.name: Create_Case_Record_with_case_assignment_rule
actionCalls.label: Create Case Record with case assignment rule

Flow.description: Remove service New Hire and termination.

formulas.name: varServiceRequestDetail
formulas.expression: if((NOT(ISNULL({!Region})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Region}))), "Region - " +{!Region} + {!newLine} ,null)+ if((NOT(ISNULL({!Brand2})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Brand2}))), "Brand - " +{!Brand2} + {!newLine} ,null)+ if((NOT(ISNULL({!Brand3})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Brand3}))), "Brand - " +{!Brand3} + {!newLine} ,null)+ If(NOT(ISNULL({!Requested_by})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Requested_by})), {!Requested_by} ,null)+ IF({!OnBehalfOf.recordName}!=NULL, "Requested For - " +{!OnBehalfOf.recordName}+ {!newLine}, "") +IF({!Service.topPicklistApiName}!=NULL,"Service - " +{!Service.topValue}+ {!newLine}, "")+ IF({!Service.middlePicklistApiName}!=NULL,"Category - " +{!Service.middleValue}+ {!newLine}, "")+ IF({!Service.bottomPicklistApiName}!=NULL,"Subcategory - " +{!Service.bottomValue}+ {!newLine}, "") +If(!ISNULL({!Title}) && !ISBLANK({!Title}), 'Title - ' + {!Title} + {!newLine}, Null)+ If(!ISNULL({!Description}) && !ISBLANK({!Description}), 'Description - ' + {!Description} + {!newLine}, Null)+ if((NOT(ISNULL({!Preferred_contact_method})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Preferred_contact_method}))), "Preferred contact method - " +{!Preferred_contact_method} + {!newLine} ,null)+ IF({!Contactphonenumber}!=NULL, "Contact Phone Number - " +{!Contactphonenumber}+{!newLine} , "") + If((NOT(ISNULL({!ContactEmail.value})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!ContactEmail.value}))), "Contact Email - " +{!ContactEmail.value} + {!newLine},null)+ if((NOT(ISNULL({!Is_this_request_related_to_an_existing_Case})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Is_this_request_related_to_an_existing_Case}))), "Is this request related to an existing Case - " +{!Is_this_request_related_to_an_existing_Case} + {!newLine} ,null)+ If(!ISNULL({!Existing_Case_Number}) && !ISBLANK({!Existing_Case_Number}), 'Existing Case Number- ' + {!Existing_Case_Number} + {!newLine}, Null)

Flow.label: Portal - Submit a Request Form

fields.fieldText: Please s﻿ubmit the hardware request form if you are requesting hardware.

fields.fieldText: IT Request was not submitted Please contact to Salesforce administrator.

screens.description: This form allows users to submit a request that does not match the existing Service Request form options.

fields.fieldText: Please s﻿ubmit the hardware request form if you are requesting hardware.

fields.fieldText: Please submit the Applications/Software request form if you are requesting application or software.

validationRule.errorMessage: Contact Phone number must be Numeric. Should be between 7 -15 digit long.

fields.name: Is_this_request_related_to_an_existing_Case
fields.fieldText: Is this request related to an existing Case?

fields.name: Lable1
fields.fieldText: IT Request with Case Number# {!Get_Case_Id.CaseNumber} has been created.
